comment: association of varve thickness with summer temperature follows Hardy et al. (1996)
strong relationship with ENSO; thick - light layer layer = La ninia
correlation with instrumental data was weak, but met station is distant
correlation with many variables was tested; no variable have dominating significance
no information on varve thickness data in the text
wind strength is modulated by Siberian High

other_drivers: temperature, and precipitation in other months

comment: a consequence of late summer/fall precipitation as well as of spring/early summer temperature
many variables related to summer thermal conditions can be important; no regression on instrumental data has been done
the lake is glacier fed and depends on amount of material delivered with a meltwater; boreal winter is austral summer!
